title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.6 - Amended claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 425.6 - Amended claims

State Regulations

Any time prior to certification or denial of such claim by
the Secretary of State, a municipality may submit additional information
concerning its claim or amend its claim. An amended claim shall be treated for
all purposes as a new claim. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
425.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
